templates.prompt: What is the average gross profit per deal?
templates.description: Calculates the overall average gross profit.

templates.prompt: Which LeadSource generated the most deals?
templates.description: Identifies the lead source with the highest volume.

templates.prompt: Summarize deals with negative gross profit.
templates.description: Highlights potentially problematic deals with losses.

templates.prompt: What is the distribution of sales by Vehicle Year?
templates.description: Shows sales volume based on the age of the vehicle.

templates.prompt: Which SalesRepName had the highest total gross profit?
templates.description: Identifies the top performing salesperson by profit.

templates.prompt: Are there deals missing VIN numbers?
templates.description: Checks for data quality issues related to VINs.
